I have confirmed that the LSA is being MaxAged out, but I can't put my finger on why this is taking a solid 60 seconds to happen.

I did see that OSPF is remembering the old DR on the link as I issue the 'ip ospf priority 0' command. And it's not until the router, through the use of a debug, 'Reset old DR on Fa0/0'. But the question is, what timer is being used to keep that entry for 60 seconds?

I did some light digging, but I can't seem to find an answer immediately. I'm sure its something simple that I'm overlooking, but I will dig some more when I get some free time.
